title: Bainiao Silicone Bath Brush Double Sided Exfoliating Silicone Body Back Scrubber 70CM for Men and Women (Green)
features: Silicone Material：Our bath body brush is made of quality silicone，durable, non-toxic, environmentally friendly. The silicone brush has moderate hardness, can effectively exfoliate and massage the skin，more hygienic than loofah. Suit for men, women, children and the elderly.

Double-sided use design: The silicone shower bath brush is designed on one side with soft brush and the other side with raised hard dots. You can use the suitable bath brush side to scrub different parts of your body when you need to bathe.

Humanized Design: This bath exfoliating scrubber length has increased to 27.5 inches(70cm)，and the silicone material has good tensile properties, you can easily wipe the back and other body parts that are hard to reach with your hands,such as neck, shoulders and feet. Both ends of the silicone brush are designed with handles to prevent slippage during use. In addition, after use, the silicone brush can be easily hung on the sticking hook without taking up too much space.

Pleasant: This silicon scrubber belt is not only suitable for exfoliating, the double-sided design can also massage the skin，allowing your tired body to recover faster. Silicone back scrubber can make your bathing time to be the most relaxting time of the day.

Durable: The exfoliating silicone body bath brush is more suitable for men and women. The silicone material is not easy to damage, and it lasts longer than a loofah or a plastic bath ball. It is a good choice as a gift of no more than 10 dollars.
